name: You Are Two
description:
You Are Two is a two-player puzzle/platformer prototype presented at the 2018 Ubisoft Game Lab Competition.

Play as one of two unique characters as they go through the experiences of a person suffering from bipolar disorder.

Best played on two computers using XBox (or other console) controllers.

  • Left D-Pad (WASD on keyboard) to move
  • A (Space on keyboard) to jump
  • X (E on keyboard) to pick up/drop objects
